backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented Android build features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten one‑sentence summaries for various frontend source files.
frontend/ANDROID.md: Guide explaining prerequisites and steps for building the Android APK using Capacitor and Android Studio.
frontend/android/.gitignore: Ignore rules for Android build outputs, IDE files, logs, keystores, and generated directories.
frontend/android/README.md: Notes that the Android project is generated by Capacitor and warns against manual edits except when necessary.
frontend/capacitor.config.ts: Capacitor config defining app ID, name, web output directory, and Android scheme settings.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and CSS variable definitions setting dark horror‑themed color palettes and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template loading the React app entrypoint and defining metadata and root mount element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component initializing the 3D scene, physics, UI overlays, touch controls, and theme provider.
frontend/src/components/ControlsSettings: Slide‑out settings panel allowing users to toggle mobile controls and adjust touch sensitivity.
frontend/src/components/Elberr.tsx: 3D model and idle animation of the E.L.B.E.R.R. robot using Cannon physics and Three.js primitives.
frontend/src/components/GameUI.tsx: Static HUD showing crosshair, title, and pointer‑lock instructions.
frontend/src/components/Player.tsx: First‑person player controller handling physics movement, camera rotation, crouch height, and sprinting.
frontend/src/components/Workshop.tsx: Creates a 3D workshop scene with a floor and four static physics walls using react-three and cannon.
frontend/src/controls/touch/MobileAction: Defines touch action buttons that trigger interact, sprint, and crouch actions through a touch input bridge.
frontend/src/controls/touch/MobileTouchC: Displays the mobile controls overlay including joystick, look area, and action buttons when enabled in settings.
frontend/src/controls/touch/TouchLookAre: Implements a touch-based look control area that reports pointer movement deltas scaled by sensitivity.
frontend/src/controls/touch/VirtualJoyst: Provides a touch joystick that outputs normalized movement values via the touch input bridge.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context with login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder hook returning an empty queries object.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for theming and layout, including full-screen canvas styling.
frontend/src/input/keyboardMouseInput.ts: Captures keyboard and mouse movement to produce normalized movement, look deltas, and action states.
frontend/src/input/touchInput.ts: Implements touch input handling with setters for movement, look, and actions returning normalized input.
frontend/src/input/touchInputBridge.ts: Provides a global bridge to forward movement, look, and action updates to the current touch input handler.
frontend/src/input/types.ts: Defines normalized input structures and the InputSource interface.
frontend/src/input/useUnifiedInput.ts: Combines keyboard/mouse and touch input into a single normalized control object and resets input on visibility change.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and mounts it to the root element.
frontend/src/settings/controlsSettings.t: Loads and saves control-related settings to localStorage with defaults for mobile detection and touch sensitivity.
frontend/src/settings/useControlsSetting: React hook that manages control settings state and persists updates to localStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, radii, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite config enabling React plugin, path aliasing, and custom build output settings.
project_state.json: Metadata file describing the project state, features, and versioning for the E.L.B.E.R.R. project.
